references.paper_title: Playing Atari with deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This is a foundational paper in deep reinforcement learning, demonstrating the effectiveness of deep learning applied to reinforcement learning problems.
This is a highly influential textbook that provides a comprehensive overview of reinforcement learning and its foundational concepts.

references.paper_title: Addressing function approximation error in actor-critic methods
references.reason: This paper introduces the Twin Delayed Deep Deterministic policy gradient algorithm (TD3), a significant advancement in off-policy actor-critic methods.
This paper introduced Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO), a widely used and highly effective reinforcement learning algorithm known for its stability and ease of use.
This paper introduced the variational autoencoder (VAE), a powerful generative model that is used extensively throughout the machine learning field.
